column4: Does the shitty binary Nvidia driver just have huge memory leaks or does Ubuntu's Xorg have a problem?  After just 3 days uptime my Xorg is using 1.6G resident memory...really pissing me off.
yes, but I don't remember it ever being this bad before...
yeah no if ram size increases when you do nothing or after you close something there's a leak. i can't help further
